ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_ME.INTRO: Hello, my name is Marcel, and I am a frontend developer from Erkelenz, Germany. My passion for computers and everything related to them dates back to the mid-90s. There, I gained my first experiences in IT, and the fascination began. Last year, I decided to become a frontend developer to dedicate my future to this exciting industry.
ABOUT_ME.TEXT1: I love constantly developing myself, implementing new ideas, and growing through challenges. Whether working alone or as part of a team, I always work in a structured and agile manner.
ABOUT_ME.TEXT2: I am now ready to start my career as a developer and to tackle exciting challenges together with a team.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS.SUBHEADLINE: I have gained experience in my frontend development skills that have allowed me to create different exciting projects.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.INTRO: The following applications are a small sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.

PROJECTS.DABubble: DaBubble is a group created collaborative communication platform that enables teams to chat in real-time, exchange files, and organize projects.
PROJECTS.Sharkie: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.SECTION_TEXT_BODY: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work
CONTACT.EMAIL_TITLE: Please enter a valid email address
